snippet: Tomas Berdych and Radek Stepanek put Czech Republic, the defending champions, into the Davis Cup final by beating Argentina’s Carlos Berlocq and Horacio Zeballos in doubles on Saturday.
abstract: Tomas Berdych and Radek Stepanek put defending champion Czech Republic into Davis Cup final by beating Argentina’s Carlos Berlocq and Horacio Zeballos in doubles; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych and Radek Stepanek put Czech Republic, the defending champions, into the Davis Cup final by beating Argentina’s Carlos Berlocq and Horacio Zeballos in doubles on Saturday.

headline.main: Czechs Top Argentina to Reach Davis Cup Final
